long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want more of the functionality of Microsoft Word while using Google Documents?  Extra Characters helps to bridge the gap by improving how accented characters are added to a Google Document.  The easy to use system provided by Extra Characters helps you to make the most of this powerful free software.

To get started just download the add on and go to your tools tab in the Google Documents page.  Then activate Extra Characters and follow the submenu.  From there you can start clicking on the various letters to add them to your page.

Current version supports Spanish Language additional characters and does not support alt key number pad codes at this time, this may be implemented on a future version.  However more characters can be added if individuals request them.
